explains: n. 现场解说，实况报道；评注性著作，评论文；讨论，评论；说明，写照
wordGroup: running commentary 当场连续评述

sentences.en: You can hear commentary on the game at halftime.
sentences.cn: 你可在中场休息时听到对比赛的评论。

sentences.en: He kept up a running commentary on everyone who came in or went out.
sentences.cn: 他不断地对上下场的每一名队员进行解说。

sentences.en: The petty quarrels were a sad commentary on the state of the government.
sentences.cn: 这些鸡毛蒜皮的争吵说明了政府的状况很糟糕。
